channel.title: 718 matrix run help!
channel.description:
everytime i click to run the source i get this error
Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: 718 matrix run help!
item.dc:creator: @Trizimo Trizimo
item.description:
@Trizimo wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:4, topic:452272”][quote author=xplode link=topic=555157.msg4064824#msg4064824 date=1343774385]
everytime i click to run the source i get this error

Error: missing server' JVM atC:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll’.
Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components.
Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]

use this

@echo off title runserver "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/quote]

I had the same problem, I tried to edit the run.bat like you said, but a new error came up:

[Launcher] Initing Cache…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/alex/store/Store
at com.rs.cache.Cache.init(Cache.java:20)
at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:62)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.alex.store.Store
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
… 2 more
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: 718 matrix run help!
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Did you remove java in anyway? Like delete anything?

If you did, uninstall jdk and jre7 and reinstall it.

Read full topic
